title: Yasuo's ult interactivity
body: Can someone please explain how Yasuo's ult having interactivity with nearly all movement disruptions in the game is considered balanced? I'm not the most amazing player ever so my understanding of how balancing works in league is not very in depth but it just seems to me that Yasuo turning a knockback from Hecarim's devastating charge or a vault from Quinn into a 1 second disable at 1200 range is a little bit ridiculous in terms of interactivity.
